message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate you coming back with a counteroffer. While I value your interest, $10,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to compromise, but I can't go below $11,500. This price reflects the value of the product and allows for a fair deal for both of us. Let's find a solution that works for both parties.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $11,000. This still keeps the transaction within my budget while acknowledging the value of the product.
